lead_paragraph: While the dispute raised tensions between the neighbors, it did not approach levels seen in 2014, when anti-China demonstrations turned into deadly riots.

byline.contributor: Edward Wong contributed reporting from Beijing, and Yufan Huang contributed research.

snippet: While the dispute raised tensions between the neighbors, it did not approach levels seen in 2014, when anti-China demonstrations turned into deadly riots.

headline.main: Vietnam Objects to Chinese Oil Rig in Disputed Waters
headline.print_headline: Vietnam Assails China in Sea Dispute

abstract: Vietnamese officials condemn installation of Chinese oil rig in disputed region of South China Sea, recalling similar standoff over same rig, leading to fatal 2014 riot; complaint, which China denies, comes after series of Chinese incursions into Vietnamese territory, and coincides with transfer of power within Vietnam's ruling Communist Party.
